scenario.name: UAC with x-application-sid header
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:+12125551212@jambonz.org SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag09[call_number] To: <sip:12125551212@jambonz.org> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: uac-pcap-carrier-success Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] X-Application-Sid: 3b43e39f-4346-4218-8434-a53130e8be49
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
